results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A101296(n), A291751(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
comment: This filter combines information about A101296(n) (prime signature of n, A046523), A003557(n) and A048250(n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 08 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16385
